IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TRI-VALLEY, INC. IS AN ORGANIZATION THAT IS SET UP TO ASSIST ELIGIBLE OLDER RESIDENTS WITH A RANGE OF SERVICES THAT WILL ENHANCE THEIR QUALITY OF LIFE AND ALLOW THEM TO LIVE AS INDEPENDENTLY AS POSSIBLE IN DIGNITY AND RESPECT.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TRI-VALLEY, INC. IS AN ORGANIZATION THAT IS SET UP TO ASSIST ELIGIBLE OLDER RESIDENTS WITH A RANGE OF SERVICES THAT WILL ENHANCE THEIR QUALITY OF LIFE AND ALLOW THEM TO LIVE AS INDEPENDENTLY AS POSSIBLE IN DIGNITY AND RESPECT.
IRS990.Desc: STATE FUNDED HOME CARE - PROVIDES COMMUNITY BASED SERVICES TO THE ELDERLY, INCLUDING CASE MANAGEMENT

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: ADULT FAMILY CARE AND PERSONAL CARE ATTENDANTS - PROVIDES FAMILY LIVING AS AN ALTERNATIVE TO INSTITUTIONAL CARE. THE PROGRAM MATCHES PARTICIPANTS WITH CAREGIVERS WHO PROVIDE 24-HOUR SUPPORT IN THEIR HOMES OR ALLOWS CONSUMERS TO SELECT, TRAIN AND EMPLOY THEIR OWN CAREGIVERS WITH SUPPORT FROM SOCIAL WORKERS AND NURSING STAFF.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: SENIOR CARE OPTIONS - COMBINES HEALTH SERVICE FEE WITH SOCIAL SUPPORT SERVICES BY COORDINATING CARE AND SPECIALIZED GERIATRIC SUPPORT SERVICES, ALONG WITH RESPITE CARE FOR FAMILIES AND CAREGIVERS.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: NUTRITION AND SUPPORT - INCLUDES HOME-DELIVERED MEALS TO INDIVIDUALS WHO ARE UNABLE TO LEAVE THEIR HOMES WITHOUT DIFFICULTY; COMMUNITY DINING CENTERS WHICH CREATE AN OPPORTUNITY FOR INDIVIDUALS 60 YEARS AND OLDER AN OPPORTUNITY FOR SOCIALIZING WHILE ENJOYING A NUTRITIOUS LUNCH; AND EMERGENCY FOOD PANTRY SERVICES.
PROTECTIVE SERVICES - INVESTIGATES AND RESOLVES ALLEGATIONS OF ELDER ABUSE INCLUDING PHYSICAL, EMOTIONAL, SEXUAL, FINANCIAL EXPLOITATION, NEGLECT OR SELF NEGLECT.

OTHER PROGRAMS - INCLUDE: CARE TRANSITIONS WHICH HELP OLDER AND DISABLED ADULTS TRANSITION FROM THE HOSPITAL OR REHAB SETTING TO HOME; CONGEGRATE HOUSING WHICH IS A LOW-COST SHARED LIVING EXPERIENCE IN A HOME-LIKE ENVIRONMENT THAT IS IDEAL FOR ELDERS AND YOUNGER DISABLED PEOPLE WHO ARE LOOKING FOR SOCIALIZATION AND INDEPENDENT LIVING; ELDER MENTAL HEALTH OUTREACH WHICH INCREASES BEHAVIORAL HEALTH SUPPORT IN UNDERSERVED COMMUNITIES; AND MONEY MANAGEMENT WHICH MATCHES TRAINED, INSURED AND SUPERVISED VOLUNTEERS WITH ELDERS WHO NEED HELP BALANCING THE CHECKING ACCOUNT, SETTING UP A BUDGET, WRITING CHECKS AND SORTING MAIL. OTHER SERVICES ARE PROVIDED TO INDIVIDUALS THROUGH SEVERAL DIFFERENT PROGRAMS WHICH ARE OPERATED IN CONJUNCTION WITH OTHER AGENCIES; PROGRAMS WHICH ARE NOT DIRECTLY STATE SUPPORTED EFFORTS; AND, PROGRAMS WHICH ARE DESIGNED TO MEET SPECIFIC COMMUNITY/ INDIVIDUAL NEEDS.

BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: MEDICAL RESOURCES HOME HEALTH CORP DB

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE REPRESENTATIVE PAYEE PROGRAM SERVES AS THE INSTITUTIONAL REPRESENTATIVE FOR INDIVIDUALS WITH INTELLECTUAL OR DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILITIES TO ENSURE THEIR MONTHLY BILLS ARE PAID ON-TIME AND IN-FULL. ALL AMOUNTS ARE RECORDED AS A LIABILITY AND ASSET.

THE ORGANIZATION EVALUATES ITS TAX POSITIONS TAKEN OR EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN IN ITS TAX RETURNS TO DETERMINE WHETHER THE TAX POSITIONS ARE MORE-LIKELY-THAN-NOT OF BEING SUSTAINED BY THE APPLICABLE TAX AUTHORITY. TAX POSITIONS NOT DEEMED TO MEET THE MORE-LIKELY-THAN-NOT THRESHOLD, ALONG WITH ACCRUED INTEREST AND PENALTIES THEREON, WOULD BE RECORDED AS AN EXPENSE IN THE CURRENT YEAR CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. MANAGEMENT HAS EVALUATED THE TAX POSITIONS TAKEN IN ITS PREVIOUSLY FILED RETURNS AND THOSE EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN IN ITS FISCAL YEAR 2022 RETURNS AND BELIEVE THEY ARE MORE-LIKELY-THAN-NOT OF BEING SUSTAINED IF EXAMINED BY FEDERAL OR STATE TAX AUTHORITIES.
REVENUE FROM CONSOLIDATED SUBSIDIARY AND ELIMINATIONS
EXPENSES FROM CONSOLIDATED SUBSIDIARY AND ELIMINATIONS

VETERANS OUTREACH PROGRAM -A PROGRAM TO PROVIDE EDUCATION, SUPPORT AND CONNECTION TO COMMUNITY RESOURCES AND BENEFITS FOR THOSE WHO SERVED IN THE U.S. ARMED FORCES, RESERVE, OR NATIONAL GUARD, AND THEIR IMMEDIATE FAMILY MEMBERS. EMHOT PROGRAM - THE ELDER MENTAL HEALTH OUTREACH TEAM PROVIDES BEHAVIORAL HEALTH SUPPORTS IN UNDERSERVED COMMUNITIES. OUR GOAL IS TO ADVANCE THE HEALTH AND WELL-BEING OF OLDER ADULTS BY OFFERING TIMELY, FLEXIBLE ACCESS TO BEHAVIORAL AND MENTAL HEALTH SERVICES TO LIVE HEALTHIER LIVES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FISCAL DIRECTOR AND EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR REVIEW THE COMPLETED FORM 990 FOR FORM AND CONTENT BEFORE FILING WITH THE IRS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EACH CONFLICT OF INTEREST IS TO BE DISCLOSED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS ON A YEARLY BASIS. FOR ALL DECISIONS BY THE BOARD, IF A CONFLICT ARISES, THE INDIVIDUAL IS ASKED TO RESCUSE FROM PARTICIPATING IN DISCUSSIONS AND DECISIONS. IF THE INDIVIDUAL REFUSES, THEY ARE SUBJECT TO REMOVAL FROM THE BOARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PROCESS FOR DETERMINING COMPENSATION INCLUDES ALL OF THE FOLLOWING ELEMENTS: REVIEW AND APPROVAL BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF THE ORGANIZATION. USE OF DATA TO COMPENSATE LEVELS OF COMPARABLE POSITIONS AT SIMILAR ORGANIZATIONS, AND CONTEMPORANEOUS DOCUMENTATION WITH RESPECT TO DECISIONS REGARDING COMPENSATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COPIES OF ALL PUBLIC DOCUMENTS OF THE ORGANIZATION ARE LOCATED AT THE AGENCY'S MAIN OFFICE AND ARE MADE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON WRITTEN REQUEST
THE FINANCE COMMITTEE ASSUMES THE RESPONSIBILITY FOR OVERSIGHT OF THE AUDIT, REVIEW AND COMPILATION OF ITS FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND SELECTION OF AN INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT.

IdRelatedOrgTxblCorpTrGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: OWNS AND OPERATES A BUILDING USED FOR OFFICE SPACE
